name: The Last Show: Magical world Hidden game
name_original: The Last Show: Magical world Hidden game
description:
Are you crazy for Hidden Games!!!

So let's enjoy this game.

In this game each level is interesting which includes scenes of the last Show of Magic. The player should find the hidden object which is lost by the magician during the last show. The lost objects are given on the below panel and in this way you have to play each and every levels of this game.

Endless Game Play!


Enjoy And Have Fun!!
